contentTypes.description: Configuration for which types of content to mute

posts.description: Mute regular posts from accounts on this list

quotes.description: Mute quote posts from accounts on this list

replies.description: Mute replies from accounts on this list

reposts.description: Mute reposts from accounts on this list

main.description: A record for muting content from all accounts on a list with fine-grained control over content types, duration, and feed targeting

contentTypes.description: Types of content to mute from accounts on this list

expiresAt.description: When this mute expires. If not set, mute is permanent

reason.description: Optional reason for muting this list

subject.description: AT-URI of the list to mute (app.bsky.graph.list record)

targetFeeds.description: Specific feeds where this mute should apply. If empty, applies to all feeds
